com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.exception

Class IBMECMRuntimeException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • RuntimeException
          • IBMECMRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class IBMECMRuntimeException
extends RuntimeException
    Primary runtime exception class that is thrown for server-side and user-specific errors.

    For each exception thrown, there is an IBMECMErrorCode associated that can be used to identify the type of errors.

    See Also:
    IBMECMErrorCode, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • IBMECMRuntimeException

        public IBMECMRuntimeException(IBMECMErrorCode errorCode,
                              String message)
        Constructs an IBMECMRuntimeException instance. An IBMECMRuntimeException is always tied to an associated error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the reference to IBMECMErrorCode that identifies the error associated with this exception
        message - the localized error message associated with this exception

      • IBMECMRuntimeException

        public IBMECMRuntimeException(IBMECMErrorCode errorCode,
                              String message,
                              String explanation,
                              String userResponse)
        Constructs an IBMECMRuntimeException instance. An IBMECMRuntimeException is always tied to an associated error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the reference to IBMECMErrorCode that identifies the error associated with this exception
        message - the localized error message associated with this exception
        explanation - the localized expanded explanation of the error associated with this exception
        userResponse - the localized error recovery suggestion associated with this exception

      • IBMECMRuntimeException

        public IBMECMRuntimeException(IBMECMErrorCode errorCode,
                              Throwable errorStack)
        Constructs an IBMECMRuntimeException instance. An IBMECMRuntimeException is always tied to an associated error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the reference to IBMECMErrorCode that identifies the error associated with this exception
        errorStack - the error stack associated with this exception

      • IBMECMRuntimeException

        message - the localized error message associated with this exception
        errorStack - the error stack associated with this exception
